alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 8:55AM CDT until August 09 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in northeast Kansas, Wyandotte. In west central Missouri, Clay, Jackson and Platte. * WHEN...Until noon CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 855 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kansas City, Independence, Shawnee, Liberty, Gladstone, Bonner Springs, Parkville, Basehor, Edwardsville, North Kansas City, Sugar Creek, Riverside, Claycomo, Kansas City Kansas, Pleasant Valley, Avondale, Northmoor, Houston Lake and River Bend. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
